title: [Melbourne buildings]
brief_description: A compilation of short segments highlighting various Melbourne buildings. ‘Elizabeth Tower Motel’ showcasing the cantilever staircase; construction of the new ‘Allan’s Music’ building; a modern office building; Parliament House; St Vincent’s Hospital; demolition of a building on an unidentified site; footage of the intersection of Flinders and Swanston streets taken from Southbank showing the Federation Square site and surrounds before the Gas and Fuel towers were constructed and demolished; ornamental gates near St Paul’s Cathedral; ANZ Bank.
